bibl.title: Copy of the card displayed with the Walter Reed bust, by the Reed Memorial Association, [1935]

div1.p: Truby comments on the text of the inscription displayed with the Reed bust.

div1.head: Copy of the card displayed with the Walter Reed bust, by the Reed Memorial Association, [1935]
div1.p:
PRESIDENT of the Board of Army Medical
Officers that discovered and demon-
strated, in 1901, the transmission of
yellow fever by mosquitoes.

Marble bust, by HANS SCHULER, sculptor, deposited
by THE REED MEMORIAL ASSOCIATION

Copy of the Card which was displayed with
the bust while at the National Museum.

Certain Cubans objected to this
card.

ARMY MEDICAL CENTER WASHINGTON, D.C.
----
OFFICIAL
----
